item.title: Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open
item.description:
Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open

It's been a big year for Lavazza. Not only is it their 120th anniversary, they've also partnered with the Italian Pavillon at the World Exposition Milan 2015 and expanded their tennis partnerships to include a sponsorship of the US Open.

item.title: Food & Beer (Pre-order) | Food & Cookery | Phaidon Store
item.description:
Food & Beer (Pre-order) | Food & Cookery | Phaidon Store

The debut book by Danish gypsy brewer Jeppe Jarnit-Bjergsø of the bar Tørst, and Canadian chef Daniel Burns of the Michelin-starred restaurant Luksus-both in a shared space in Greenpoint, Brooklyn where they elevate beer to the level of wine in fine dining.

item.title: Chocolate Skateboards + DQM + Mast Brothers
item.description:
Chocolate Skateboards + DQM + Mast Brothers

Since its humble beginnings as a sister company to Mike Carroll and Rick Howard's Girl Skateboards, Chocolate has grown into one of the more influential brands in skateboarding's surrounding culture. Now 20 years later, with legends like Gino Iannucci and young gun Elijah Berle on the roster, the company shows no signs of slowing.
